ing: 1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®), or more to taste
2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a recipe my Grammy made since before I was born and has been a hit in my family just as long. It's super easy, and fresh garden veggies make it even tastier!"
ins: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, creamy salad dressing, sugar, salt, and black pepper in a salad bowl. If salad seems too sweet, add more salad dressing; if too tart, add more sugar. Chill before serving.
